descriptionNullable:
It is the only dataset with **user rating** and **book description** in Kaggle.

This dataset has enough data to make the following recommendation systems.

- Association Rule Learning
- User Based Recommendation
- Content Based Recommendation
- Matrix Based Collaborative Modeling ( Matrix Factorization )


**Highlight**
- 6.000.000 rating
- 4 columns for Content Based Recommendation
title: goodbooks_10k_rating_and_description
